snippet: The jet was one of a number of Sudanese warplanes bombing South Sudan’s oil-rich Unity State, a South Sudanese spokesman said, underlining a worry that a full-fledged war will break out.
abstract: South Sudan says that it shot down a north Sudanese fighter jet in its territory as the two armies continue to clash in a dispute that international observers worry may be inching closer to war; jet was one of a number of Sudanese warplanes bombing South Sudan’s oil-rich Unity State.
lead_paragraph: The jet was one of a number of Sudanese warplanes bombing South Sudan’s oil-rich Unity State, a South Sudanese spokesman said, underlining a worry that a full-fledged war will break out.

headline.seo: South Sudan Says It Downs Sudan Jet as Clashes Continue
headline.main: South Sudan Says It Shot Down Sudan Jet Amid Clashes
headline.print_headline: South Sudan Says It Downs Sudan Jet Amid Clashes
